attributes.action: To Free Our Brothers And Sisters (Muslim) Community In The Uyghur Camps In China
attributes.additional_details: treatment of the Uighur Muslims is classed as genocide; with forced abortion and other methods being reportedly applied to limit the birth rates of the Uighur people we as humans cannot let them get away with such crimes we need to stop this not to mention the woman children and men suffering physically and mental abuse the Horrific torture and suffering they are going through and can not justify in any way with what they are doing. We need The government to intervene this time with a firm foot
attributes.background: Evidence of the treatment of the Uighur Muslims minority within the westernmost region of China has been known about for several years, with the existence of such camps emerging in 2017, after several years of alleged abuses against the woman men and children.
